TextBlock.Text: MENTH: This crystal really helped us. I can't bear to leave you here.
SACCO: I'll be the last to pull back the hatch. It must be difficult for you, and Cumin.
MENTH: Oh please. After all, this crystal alone won't be enough to solve the problem.
SACCO: I'll overlook leaving hints like that. It's really difficult for Nomai to hide any knowledge.
